accepted_plans.name: Aetna
accepted_plans.category: Commercial, Medicare Advantage, Medicaid Managed Care
accepted_plans.notes: Referral may be required for HMO plans. Verify specific plan benefits.

accepted_plans.name: Blue Cross Blue Shield
accepted_plans.category: Commercial, Medicare Advantage, Medicaid Managed Care
accepted_plans.notes: Accepts most state-specific BCBS plans. Out-of-state plans require verification.

accepted_plans.name: Cigna
accepted_plans.notes: Check network status for specific Cigna plans.

accepted_plans.name: UnitedHealthcare
accepted_plans.category: Commercial, Medicare Advantage, Medicaid Managed Care
accepted_plans.notes: Includes UHC Community Plan and Optum sub-plans. Verify eligibility.

accepted_plans.name: Medicare
accepted_plans.type: Part A, Part B, Medicare Advantage (various plans)
accepted_plans.notes: Accepts traditional Medicare. For Medicare Advantage, verify specific plan.

accepted_plans.name: Medicaid
accepted_plans.notes: Accepts state-specific Medicaid MCOs (e.g., Molina, Ambetter, WellCare). Patient must be active.

accepted_plans.name: Humana
accepted_plans.notes: Verify specific Humana plan details, especially for Medicare Advantage.

accepted_plans.name: Kaiser Permanente
accepted_plans.notes: Generally in-network only for Kaiser facilities. Requires specific referral process for outside care.

accepted_plans.name: TRICARE
accepted_plans.notes: Accepts most TRICARE plans. Ensure authorization is in place for specialized services.

accepted_plans.name: Veterans Affairs (VA) Community Care
accepted_plans.notes: Requires prior authorization from VA for all services.

accepted_plans.name: Molina Healthcare
accepted_plans.notes: Commonly a Medicaid managed care plan. Verify state and plan specifics.

accepted_plans.name: Ambetter
accepted_plans.notes: Health insurance marketplace plan. Verify network and referral requirements.

accepted_plans.name: Oscar Health
accepted_plans.notes: Tech-driven health insurance. Check specific plan for network coverage.

accepted_plans.name: Bright HealthCare
accepted_plans.notes: Focus on integrated care. Verify network participation.

accepted_plans.name: Centene Corporation
accepted_plans.notes: Parent company for multiple managed care plans. Verification needed by subsidiary name.

accepted_plans.name: Anthem
accepted_plans.category: Commercial, Medicare Advantage, Medicaid Managed Care
accepted_plans.notes: Often a licensee of Blue Cross Blue Shield. Verify specific state plan.

accepted_plans.name: WellCare
accepted_plans.notes: Specializes in government-sponsored programs. Verify plan type.

accepted_plans.name: Fidelis Care
accepted_plans.category: Medicaid Managed Care, Child Health Plus, Essential Plan
accepted_plans.notes: Primarily New York-based. Verify specific program.

accepted_plans.name: Health Net
accepted_plans.category: Commercial, Medicare Advantage, Medicaid Managed Care
accepted_plans.notes: Strong presence in California and other Western states. Check network.

accepted_plans.name: Magellan Health
accepted_plans.notes: Primarily covers mental health and substance use services. Often a carve-out.

accepted_plans.name: MultiPlan
accepted_plans.notes: Not an insurance company, but a network used by many smaller insurers. Verify primary insurer.

accepted_plans.name: PHCS (Private Healthcare Systems)
accepted_plans.notes: Similar to MultiPlan, provides network access for various payers.

accepted_plans.name: First Health
accepted_plans.notes: A network solution for self-funded employers and other payers.

accepted_plans.name: Optum
accepted_plans.notes: Often the behavioral health arm of UnitedHealthcare. Verify specific coverage.

accepted_plans.name: Managed Health Network (MHN)
accepted_plans.notes: A subsidiary of Health Net, focusing on behavioral health.

accepted_plans.name: Beacon Health Options
accepted_plans.notes: Large behavioral health managed care company. Verify specific plan.

accepted_plans.name: ValueOptions
accepted_plans.notes: Now part of Beacon Health Options. Covers mental health and substance use.

accepted_plans.name: ComPsych
accepted_plans.notes: Often provides EAP services and behavioral health benefits through employers.

accepted_plans.name: EAP (Employee Assistance Programs)
accepted_plans.notes: Coverage for short-term counseling or referrals. Verify specific EAP provider.

accepted_plans.name: Workers' Compensation
accepted_plans.notes: Requires claim number and authorization for work-related injuries.

accepted_plans.name: No-Fault (Auto Accident) Insurance
accepted_plans.notes: Requires claim number and authorization for injuries sustained in auto accidents.

accepted_plans.name: GEHA (Government Employees Health Association)
accepted_plans.notes: Health plans for federal employees and retirees.

accepted_plans.name: Tivity Health (SilverSneakers, Prime)
accepted_plans.notes: Often included with Medicare Advantage plans for fitness benefits.

accepted_plans.name: Devoted Health
accepted_plans.notes: Newer Medicare Advantage provider with integrated care.

accepted_plans.name: Alignment Health Plan
accepted_plans.notes: Focuses on seniors and Medicare beneficiaries.

accepted_plans.name: Wellmark Blue Cross Blue Shield
accepted_plans.notes: Specific to Iowa and South Dakota. Verify regional plan.

accepted_plans.name: Capital BlueCross
accepted_plans.notes: Specific to Central Pennsylvania and Lehigh Valley. Verify regional plan.

accepted_plans.name: Highmark Blue Cross Blue Shield
accepted_plans.notes: Serves Pennsylvania, West Virginia, and Delaware. Verify regional plan.

accepted_plans.name: Premera Blue Cross
accepted_plans.notes: Serves Washington and Alaska. Verify regional plan.

accepted_plans.name: Regence BlueShield
accepted_plans.notes: Serves Washington, Oregon, Idaho, and Utah. Verify regional plan.
